activities: Wilke Global provides contracted data hosting services to its clients. Typically, clients collect and maintain general and sensitive data on their customers such as name, address, phone numbers, email addresses and descriptions of experiences with the company and its products. This data is owned by the client but resides on Wilke Global’s servers in Columbus, Ohio, USA. Wilke Global provides hardware and software maintenance functions, and data safeguarding and backup only. Wilke Global does not access or further transfer clients' data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Wilke Global has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Wilke Global, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
